# grammarDetails

**Instance Property**

The details of a located grammatical type checking result.

## Declaration

```swift
var grammarDetails: [[String : Any]]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This array of strings is suitable for presenting to the user.

## Text Checking Results for Grammar

- **grammarCheckingResult(range:details:)**: Creates and returns a text checking result with the specified array of grammatical errors.

items.description: Creates and returns a text checking result with the specified array of grammatical errors.
